Title
A sketch of the operations of his majesty's fleet and army under the command of Vice Admiral the Rt. Hble. Lord Viscount Howe and Genl. Sr. W. Howe...
Date
1776
Author
Des Barres, Joseph F. W. (Joseph Frederick Wallet), (Cartographer)
Author, date of birth, death
1729-1824
Publisher
J. F. W. Des Barres, Esq.
Collector

Holding institution

Description from holding institution
Extent; 1 print ; line engraving, hand-colored ; 82.5 x 59.8 cm. Publish'd according to Act of Parliament Jany. 17, 1777, by J. F. W. Des Barres, Esq.
